Ihe A Na-ejighị N'aka Emeela - The Uncertainty Has Settled bụ ihe ngosi banyere ihu igwe, ike na ọrụ ugbo
Ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Dutch bụ Marijn Poels mepụtara ma duzie ya, e wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'afọ 2017.
Áhà nkiri ahụ na-ezo áká na nkwupụta na "sayensị edoziwo", nkè ndị mmadụ dịka Arnold Schwarzenegger na Al Gore mèrè.
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, Poels na-eleta ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ihu igwe, yana ndị na-ajụ sayensị ọnọdụ ihu igwe, ma hapụ ónyé na-ekiri ya ka ọ nweta nkwubi okwu nke ha
Ndị gárá gụnyere ndị na-enyo ihu igwe enyo Piers Corbyn, ónyé na-enyocha mbara igwe na Britain na onye na-ekwu maka nkwekọrịta, na ónyé na'ahụ màkà physics nke Britain / America Freeman Dyson.
Ihe nkiri a mèrè n'ụwa niile n'ubochi itoolu n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017 na Berlin Independent Film Festival, na-egosi na akụkọ ihe mere eme Kino Babylon, ebe ọ meriri ihe ngosi kachasị mma.
E gosipụtakwara ya na Mindfield Film Festival Los Angeles, ébé ọ meriri Diamond Award màkà ihe ngosi kachasị mma, na Paris Independent Film Festival, ébé ọ ritere ihe ngosi kachasị kyau.
E nyèrè ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka ihe ngosi kachasị mma.
